Image.Title: Project One
Image.Text:
New hot Features

The all new Piecemaker comes with lots of new features, making it even more slick.

Just to mention a few - you can now specify unlimited transition styles, include your own SWF and Video files, add hyperlinks to images and info texts with all special characters.

We also impoved the navigation and the animation with animated shadows and pixel-perfect transitions.
